title: Failed to get remote head and new block ranges
body:
## Description

i run lighthouse  by docker
```
sudo podman run --name lighthouse -d -p 9000:9000/tcp -p 9000:9000/udp \
	-p 127.0.0.1:5052:5052 -v /data/lighthouse:/root/.lighthouse \
	sigp/lighthouse lighthouse --network mainnet beacon --http --http-address 0.0.0.0 \
	--checkpoint-sync-url=https://beaconstate.info \
	--execution-endpoint http://10.40.53.158:8551 --execution-jwt /root/.lighthouse/jwttoken
```
Error log: 

ERRO Error updating deposit contract cache   error: Failed to get remote head and new block ranges: EndpointError(FarBehind), retry_millis: 60000, service: deposit_contract_rpc

```

Geth by docker
```
sudo podman run -d -p 8545:8545 -p 30303:30303 -p 8551:8551 \
	--name ethereum -v /data/eth-snap/:/root/.ethereum \
	ethereum/client-go:v1.10.25 \
	--http --http.addr 0.0.0.0 --http.port 8545 \
	--http.api personal,eth,net,web3 --maxpeers 100 --cache 2048 --allow-insecure-unlock \
	--gcmode archive --syncmode snap \
	--authrpc.jwtsecret=/root/.ethereum/jwttoken --authrpc.addr=0.0.0.0
```
log :
```
WARN [10-27|10:27:21.514] Beacon client online, but never received consensus updates. Please ensure your beacon client is operational to follow the chain! 
INFO [10-27|10:27:27.207] Upgrading chain index                    type=bloombits percentage=11

## Version

$ lighthouse --version
Lighthouse v3.2.0-fcfd02a
BLS library: blst-portable
SHA256 hardware acceleration: false
Specs: mainnet (true), minimal (false), gnosis (true)

$ geth version
Geth
Version: 1.10.25-stable
Git Commit: 69568c554880b3567bace64f8848ff1be27d084d
Architecture: amd64
Go Version: go1.18.6
Operating System: linux
GOPATH=
GOROOT=go

This is due to Geth not being synced yet.

Geth can't finish syncing until Lighthouse syncs to head, so it's a good idea to use checkpoint sync to sync Lighthouse quickly: https://lighthouse-book.sigmaprime.io/checkpoint-sync.html

You'll need to delete your existing Lighthouse beacon node database for the checkpoint sync flag to take effect

> This is due to Geth not being synced yet.
> 
> Geth can't finish syncing until Lighthouse syncs to head, so it's a good idea to use checkpoint sync to sync Lighthouse quickly: https://lighthouse-book.sigmaprime.io/checkpoint-sync.html
> 
> You'll need to delete your existing Lighthouse beacon node database for the checkpoint sync flag to take effect

Thank you for your reply.

Do I need to wait until the geth synchronization is complete?
Then restart lighthouse after clearing the database

> Do I need to wait until the geth synchronization is complete?

No, Geth won't finish syncing until Lighthouse syncs

> > Do I need to wait until the geth synchronization is complete?
> 
> No, Geth won't finish syncing until Lighthouse syncs

thank you very much 。

I ignored the mistake,
Today,  lighthouse is synced to the latest block
```
Nov 04 02:08:17.001 INFO Synced                                  slot: 5058639, block: 0x0dd2…3c53, epoch: 158082, finalized_epoch: 158080
```
Geth has also started synchronizing, although it is not yet complete 
```
INFO [11-04|02:20:43.656] Generating state snapshot                root=526318..1fc9c3 in=008f65..483efb at=bc5091..dcb5f5 accounts=397,217 slots=6,269,628 storage=543.16MiB dangling=0 elapsed=1m52.109s   eta=14h12m4.786s
INFO [11-04|02:20:49.084] Forkchoice requested sync to new head    number=15,893,630 hash=7154a6..766703
```

Hi @michaelsproul , 

I have similar issue with lighthouse beacon node 

`ERRO Error updating deposit contract cache   error: Failed to get remote head and new block ranges: EndpointError(FarBehind), retry_millis: 60000, service: deposit_contract_rpc`

Context: 
I have created a private local network using lighthouse and geth combination. 

where GETH is not syncing with reason: 
`WARN [04-19|22:35:00.865] Beacon client online, but no consensus updates received in a while. Please fix your beacon client to follow the chain!`

due to a storage issue, the client has stopped abruptly. Now, I don't want to delete the datadir. 

Are there any alternative solutions apart from deleting the datadir and restarting ?
